typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Window1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
Filter1 window() ~> Window1
source1 filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
